: : Kup : :
Kup(via commlink): Hmm, that's a good idea. Just do it carefully. Wheeljack, permission granted.
 cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:A vaccine's not good enough for this Autobot.  The first thing he 
does is construct a special sampling drone, one that would be 
unaffected by the rust plague.  He stops for only half a second to 
admire his handiwork before activating his comm.

"Kup, I'm requesting permission to send a plastic drone outside to 
take a sample of that dust, so I can work on a cure to stamp this 
plague out once and for all."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> The red alert sends Jackie scrambling for the labs.  "There has to 
be 
> a cure for this," he tells himself.  "And I'm gonna find it or die 
> trying!"
